Uses of Class
Items.Item

  • Packages that use Item 
    Package Description
    Game  
    Items  

    • Uses of Item in Game

      Methods in Game that return types with arguments of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Item> Area.getItems() 
      Methods in Game with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Area.addItem(Item item)
      Adds an Item to the items ArrayList
      void Area.removeItem(Item i)
      Is used to "destroy" an Item, it actually just makes it invisible and not solid to avoid Errors
      Method parameters in Game with type arguments of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Area.addItems(java.util.ArrayList<Item> items)
      Adds an ArrayList of Items to the items ArrayList

    • Uses of Item in Items

      Subclasses of Item in Items 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Coin
      Coin Item that can be picked up by Mario and adds to the score on the Scoreboard
      class  ExtraLife
      Extra Life Item that can be picked up by Mario and gives him 1 more life
